name: António Santos
professionalDescription: I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer with 10+ years of experience working with web technologies. I'm passionate about open-source projects, building high-quality software and I'm always looking for new challenges.
personalDescription: I have a 3 y/o son, André, who has been my best teacher. In my spare time, I like to pratice sports, especially calisthenics and tennis. Being a vegan brought me interest to themes such as nutrition and health. Minimalism guides me to simplify all aspects of life, to make room for what truly matters.
